get.summary: List relationships between an alarm and MITRE categories (INTERNAL)

parameters.name: idOrShortName
parameters.description: ID or short name of the alarm

parameters.name: categoryType
parameters.description: Type(s) of the MITRE categories (all by default)

parameters.name: categoryModel
parameters.description: The threat model(s) of the MITRE categories (all by default)

parameters.name: categoryVersion
parameters.description: The version(s) of the MITRE categories (all by default)

parameters.name: includeDeleted
parameters.description: To include deleted relationships or not (not included by default)

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Field(s) to sort results by (without sign is ascending, with '-' sign is descending)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The max amount of items to return (25 by default, 0 means no limit)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The amount of items to skip from the beginning (0 by default)

version.description: Version of the MITRE ATT&CK release

markAsDefault.description: A boolean flag indicating whether this version should be marked as the default one for this model (default value is null, meaning no change)

internalInformation.description: Internal information about handling the alarm. Describes how the alarm should be handled by SOC. Contents may be HTML, which will be sanitized.

internalReference.description: A link to an internal reference for the alarm

items.description: Tag an alarm with labels

links.description: Links to external descriptions of this alarm

items.description: Links to external descriptions of this alarm

references.description: Alarm vulnerability references (CVE-numbers, BID-numbers, URLs etc)

items.description: Alarm vulnerability references (CVE-numbers, BID-numbers, URLs etc)

signatures.description: List of signatures to map to this alarm

items.description: List of signatures to map to this alarm

comment.description: Comment content. Html is allowed, will be sanitized. [format:html]

categoryModel.description: Which threat model to use with external ID of the MITRE category

categoryVersion.description: Which version to use with external ID of the MITRE category

mitreCategory.description: ID or external ID of the MITRE category (external ID requires setting additional attributes: categoryModel, categoryVersion)

addLabels.description: Labels to be added to the alarm

items.description: Labels to be added to the alarm

addLinks.description: External links to be added to the alarm

items.description: External links to be added to the alarm

addReferences.description: Vulnerability references to be added to the alarm (CVE-numbers, BID-numbers, URLs etc)

items.description: Vulnerability references to be added to the alarm (CVE-numbers, BID-numbers, URLs etc)

attackCategoryID.description: Update category of alarm (unchanged if set to 0)

deleteLabels.description: Labels to be removed from the alarm

items.description: Labels to be removed from the alarm

deleteLinks.description: External links to be removed from the alarm

items.description: External links to be removed from the alarm

deleteReferences.description: Vulnerability references to be removed from the alarm

items.description: Vulnerability references to be removed from the alarm

description.description: If set, update description of alarm

disabled.description: If set, disable or enable alarm (unchanged if not set)

info.description: If set, update verbose information of alarm [format:html]

internalInformation.description: If set, update internal information about handling the alarm. Describes how the alarm should be handled by SOC. Contents may be HTML, which will be sanitized.

internalReference.description: If set, update link to an internal reference for the alarm

shortName.description: If set, update short name of the alarm

disabled.description: Disable or enable category (unchanged if not set)

signatures.description: Signatures (exist/new) to be mapped to the alarm

items.description: Signatures (exist/new) to be mapped to the alarm

field.description: Field which this message applies to

count.description: Number of available results on server

metaData.description: Additional unstructured meta data associated with response

messages.description: Contains messages returned from the API, usually error messages

data.description: Returned results (might be an array or a single object)
